channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 桑坦德银行将回购 15.7 亿美元股票并提高股息
item.description: Santander to buy back $1.57 billion in shares, raise dividend reut.rs/3SIuk2r

item.title: 观看：两位消息人士告诉 @路透社：美国总统乔-拜登的政府将放宽到 2030 年的拟议年限要求，该计划旨在积极减少尾气排放并提高电动汽车的销量。
item.description: WATCH: US President Joe Biden's administration is set to ease proposed yearly requirements through 2030 of its sweeping plan to aggressively cut tailpipe emissions and ramp up electric vehicle sales, two sources told @Reuters reut.rs/48uXCru

item.title: 观看：据游戏媒体和彭博社报道，任天堂下一代游戏机将从今年晚些时候推迟到 2025 年初，随后任天堂股价下跌
item.description: WATCH: Nintendo shares fell after reports by games media and Bloomberg that its next-generation console will be delayed until early 2025 from later this year reut.rs/49FrFNX

item.title: 陷入困境的德国房东阿德勒董事长辞职
item.description: Chairman of troubled German landlord Adler resigns reut.rs/49FK25u

item.title: 印度 Paytm 股价大涨 5%，原因是延长了部门清算日期
item.description: India's Paytm shares jump 5% after c.bank extends unit wind-down date reut.rs/3wo6DVT

item.title: Breakingviews - 镍援助太少、太迟
item.description: Breakingviews - Nickel aid is too little, too late reut.rs/3UGcGiD reut.rs/3UGcGiD

item.title: 西班牙桑坦德银行宣布 14.6 亿欧元新回购计划
item.description: Spain's Santander announces new buyback plan of 1.46 bln euros reut.rs/49zCL7L

item.title: Breakingviews - 镍援助太少、太迟
item.description: Breakingviews - Nickel aid is too little, too late reut.rs/3T5MHQx reut.rs/3T5MHQx

item.title: 印度 Paytm 股价大涨 5%，原因是延长了部门清算日期
item.description: India's Paytm shares jump 5% after c.bank extends unit wind-down date reut.rs/3uDef6b

item.title: 奥拉姆集团称无证据表明其尼日利亚分公司涉嫌外汇欺诈
item.description: Olam Group says no evidence its Nigeria unit was involved in alleged forex fraud reut.rs/42IdqWe

item.title: 西太平洋银行认为明年货币政策 "限制性减弱"，第一季度利润下降
item.description: Westpac sees monetary policy 'less restrictive' over next year, Q1 profit drops reut.rs/3V2VGn1

item.title: 奥兰集团称其调查未发现任何部门参与尼日利亚外汇欺诈案
item.description: Olam Group says its probe found no involvement of unit in Nigeria forex fraud reut.rs/3T3QfTm

item.title: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行第一季度利润低于此前六个月的季度平均水平
item.description: Australia's Westpac first-quarter profit falls from its prior six-month quarterly average reut.rs/3ULnDj4

item.title: 工会称汉莎航空地勤人员将于周二罢工
item.description: Lufthansa ground staff to strike on Tuesday, says union reut.rs/3T2GF2Y

item.title: 观看：纳斯达克指数在美国三大股指中跌幅最大，因为一份热度高于预期的生产者物价报告削弱了人们对美联储即将降息的希望
item.description: WATCH: The Nasdaq showed the largest decline of the three major US indexes after a hotter-than-expected producer prices report eroded hopes for imminent interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve reut.rs/3SAkOhW

item.title: 观看：美国劳工部报告显示，1月份生产者价格涨幅超过预期，加剧了人们对通胀在数月降温后回升的担忧，美股随之下跌。
item.description: WATCH: US stocks fell after a Labor Department report showed producer prices increased more than expected in January, feeding fears inflation was picking up after months of cooling reut.rs/3SAkOhW

item.title: 观看：亚马逊与火箭制造商太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）和杂货连锁店乔氏（Trader Joe's）一道，声称美国劳工机构的内部执法程序违反了美国宪法，这家零售业巨头面临着数十起案件。
item.description: WATCH: Amazon has joined rocket maker SpaceX and grocery chain Trader Joe's in claiming that a US labor agency's in-house enforcement proceedings violate the US Constitution, as the retail giant faces scores of cases reut.rs/49jQvDc

item.title: 观看：耐克将裁员约 2%，即 1,600 多个工作岗位，这家运动服装巨头表示，由于其鞋类和运动鞋的需求面临压力，因此将降低开支。
item.description: WATCH: Nike will cut about 2% of its total workforce, or more than 1,600 jobs, the sportswear giant said to lower expenses as demand for its shoes and sneakers comes under pressure reut.rs/3I0qf51

item.title: 观看：连续五周上涨后，美国三大股指全周下跌
item.description: WATCH: After five consecutive weeks of gains, all three major US indexes posted a weekly decline reut.rs/3SAkOhW

item.title: 观看：亚马逊在向全国劳资关系委员会提交的一份文件中表示，它计划辩称该机构的独特结构侵犯了公司获得陪审团审判的权利。
item.description: WATCH: Amazon in a filing made with the National Labor Relations Board said it plans to argue that the agency's unique structure violates the company's right to a jury trial reut.rs/49jQvDc

item.title: 以下是本周撒哈拉以南非洲地区的商业头条新闻
item.description: Here's what's been making the business headlines in sub-Saharan Africa this week

item.title: 看租金和利率的上涨导致消费者减少对高价商品的消费，运动服装巨头耐克因此宣布裁员 2
item.description: WATCH: Higher rental and interest rates have led customers to cut back spending on high-priced goods, leading sportswear giant Nike to announce 2% job cuts reut.rs/3I0qf51

item.title: 👉日本失去了世界第三大经济体的头衔，而比特币的投资总额已达 1 万亿美元。本周数字
item.description: 👉 Japan lost its title as the world’s third-biggest economy, whereas $1 trillion is the total value now invested in bitcoin. This is the Week in Numbers

item.title: 三井物产向布鲁克菲尔德出售巴西物流运营商 VLI 10% 的股份
item.description: Mitsui & Co sells a 10% stake in Brazil's logistics operator VLI to Brookfield reut.rs/49Hs02N

item.title: 观看：美国三大股指全周下跌
item.description: WATCH: All three major US indexes posted a weekly decline reut.rs/3SAkOhW

item.title: 观看：亚马逊是最新一家加入 SpaceX 和 Trader Joes 阵营的公司，它们认为美国国家劳工委员会的执法程序违宪。
item.description: WATCH: Amazon is the latest company to join SpaceX and Trader Joes in arguing that the US National Labor Board's enforcement proceedings are unconstitutional reut.rs/49jQvDc

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）在访问津巴布韦讨论其申请国际货币基金组织（IMF）员工监督计划时敦促津巴布韦加快货币改革。以下是本周撒哈拉以南非洲地区的商业头条新闻
item.description: IMF urged Zimbabwe to speed up currency reforms during a visit to discuss its request for an IMF staff-monitored program. Here's what's been making business headlines in sub-Saharan Africa this week reut.rs/49j3x3T

item.title: 观看：由于租金和利率的上涨导致顾客减少购买高价商品，耐克希望降低开支，因此将裁员 1600 多人。
item.description: WATCH: More than 1,600 jobs will be cut as Nike looks to lower expenses due to higher rental and interest rates which are leading customers to cut back on high-priced goods reut.rs/3I0qf51

item.title: 人工智能芯片冠军英伟达（Nvidia）创下的市值略高于 1.8 万亿美元，而 Lyft 利润率指标的真实数字为 50。以下是本周商业和金融领域的重大新闻
item.description: 👉 The market value hit by the AI chip champion Nvidia was a little over $1.8 trillion while the real figure for Lyft’s profit margin metric was 50. Here’s the big stories in business and finance over the week

item.title: 高盛首席执行官所罗门的薪酬增长 24%，达到 3100 万美元
item.description: Goldman Sachs CEO Solomon gets 24% pay bump to $31 million reut.rs/3UKFDtQ
